info.name: Solomon's hexagram puzzle
info.description:
Drag and drop to swap tiles.
←→ to turn tile.

reference: https://www.facebook.com/groups/tiling/posts/many-years-ago-there-was-an-online-puzzlealso-there-was-a-list-of-many-solutions/1956287014794834/

renderpass.code:
// variant of  https://shadertoy.com/view/XfVyzR

#define S(v)   smoothstep( .5*N/R.y, -.5*N/R.y, v )               // AA draw

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    init(u);
    O*=0.;                                                        // --- draw tiles
    vec4 H = T(P);
    float t = round(10.*H.x),                                     // random tile type
          a = round(6.*H.y)/6. *6.283;                            // random tile rotation
    U *= mat2( cos( a + vec4(0,1.57,-1.57,0) ) );                 // do rotation
    
#define C(v,r)   S( length(v)-r/2. )                              // --- draw tile among 10 types:                        
    O +=   t==0. ? 1.                                             // 0 spot
         : t==1. ? C( U - vec2(.5, -r/2.)   , r )                 // 1 spot
         : t==2. ? C( U - vec2(1,-s)/2.     , s )                 // 2 spots close
         : t==3. ? C( vec2( abs(U.x)-.5, U.y+r/2.) , r)           // 2 spots by 1
         : t==4. ? C( vec2( abs(U.x)-.5, sign(U.x)*U.y+r/2.) , r) // 2 spots opposed
         : t==5. ? C( U.x*s/2.+U.y*.5-r/2.  , r )                 // 3 spots close
         : t==6. ? max( C( U - vec2(1,-s)/2., s ),                // 3 spots 2 close +1
                        C( U - vec2(0,r)    , r ))
         : t==7. ? max( C( U + vec2(1,s)/2. , s ),                // 3 spots 2 close +1 sym
                        C( U - vec2(0,r)    , r ))
         : t==8. ? C( vec2(abs(U.x)-1., U.y), s )                 // 4 spots opposed
         : t==9. ? max( C( U.y+r/2.         , r ),                // 4 spots 3 close + 1 opposed
                        C( U - vec2(0,r)    , r ))
         : 0.;
    if ( H.z < .5 ) O = 1.-O;                                     // random reverse B/W
    O += .2;
    T(P).x == -1. ? O = vec4(0,.5,0,1) : O = T(P).x == -2. ? vec4(.5) : O; // background colors
 // O *= .6 + .6 * cos( .5+6.28*H.x  + vec4(0,23,21,0)  );        // debug: color tiles
    O *= S(abs( length(U)*cos( mod(atan(U.y,U.x)+.525,1.05)-.525 ))-.5+.2*N/R.y); // draw tile borders
      
      P == T(N+N).xy ? O.g += .5                                  // draw swapable tiles
    : P == T(N+N).zw ? O.r += .5 : t;
  }
renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define key(a)   texelFetch(iChannel3,ivec2(a,1),0).x

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    u -=.5;
    O = T(u);                                                     // previous state
    
    if ( u==vec2(N+N) ) {                                         // --- mouse state
        init(iMouse.xy);                                          // P = tile Id(mouse)
        O = iMouse.w > 0. ? vec4(P, 0,0 )                         // pickup tile
          : iMouse.z > 0. ? vec4(O.xy, P)                         // flyover tile
          :                 vec4(0);                              // release
    }
    else {                                                        // --- tiles management
        iFrame < 1 ? O = abs(u.x-N*.68)<5. && (u.y== N-2.||u.y==N-4.) && u!=vec2(round(N*.68),N-4.)  // init tiles
                            ? vec4( fract((u.x+1.)/10.), 0., fract(u.y/4.), 0 ) // pieces
                       : max(max(abs(u.x-N*.8),abs(u.y-12.)),abs(u.x+u.y-N*1.4)) < 3. 
                            ? vec4(-2)                            // arena
                            : vec4(-1)                            // background
                   : O; 
        
        vec4 P = T(N+N);                                          // user action:
        P.w > 0. && iMouse.z < 0.                                 // if mouse release:
            ? u == P.xy ? O = T(P.zw)                             //   swap tiles
            : u == P.zw ? O = T(P.xy) : O:O;
        if ( P.w > 0. && u == P.xy ) O.y += (key(39)-key(37))/6.; //   arrow keys: turn  
    }
}
renderpass.name: Buffer A

renderpass.code:
#define R     iResolution.xy
#define T(u)  texelFetch(iChannel0,ivec2(u),0)
float   N = 20.;                                       // vertical number of tiles       


#define init(u)    /* returns I = tile, P = Id,  U = local coords */                       \
    float s = sqrt(3.), r = 1./s;                                                          \
    vec2 U = N * u / R.y * mat2(s,-1,0,2)/4.,          /* to tilted space              */  \
         I = floor(U), P;                              /* I : hexa tile ID             */  \
    U = fract(U) *  mat2(1,.5,0,s/2.) - vec2(1,r)/2.;  /* U : local coords             */  \
    U += U.y*s+abs(U.x) < 0. ? I.y--,   + vec2( 0,r)   /* Set to hexagon over the 3    */  \
        : U.x < 0.           ? I.x--, -.5*vec2(-1,r)   /*   covered by the tilted cell */  \
        :                             -.5*vec2( 1,r);                                      \
    P = I + floor(N/2.);
renderpass.name: Common
